channel.title: HELP Needed Badly!
channel.description:
Hey Guys i got a problem. Im not sure how i release my server. Once i tryed releasing it Someone said it turned out to be in notepad when i released and let people download on mediafire. Now I turned it into Zip file and Uploaded to mediafire and got this. !
C:\Documents and Settings\[s]Name Of User[/s]\Local Settings\Temp\ModernScape Client.zip: The archive is either in unknown format or damaged [b] What Do i Do Moparscape? Please Help. How do i release it for people do download client on Mediafire? Im new to the server releasing thing.[/b]

item.title: HELP Needed Badly!
item.dc:creator: @s0uljag0d s0uljag0d
item.description:
@s0uljag0d wrote:

Okay now that i got that done. How do i put server on Moparscape Server list? it gives me a code when i register but i don’t kno where to sigh in with that code. Can u help me or someone?

Read full topic

item.title: HELP Needed Badly!
item.dc:creator: @Mr_Bobby Mr. Bobby
item.description:
@Mr_Bobby wrote:

ok looked at them the zip one is fine and its also the one you should be using the “notepad” one is just a notepad file with this in it

@echo off title Trinity-PvP :main cd Files start JavaW -Xmx500m -cp .;Theme.jar Gui

now thatd not going to work with others because first of all put ure mouse overtop of it and ull see its called

ModernScape Click to play.bat.txt

so its a text document actually called
"ModernScape Click to play.bat"with the actual extension being .txt

You cannot just upload ure run.bat or w/e it is and expect it to work for people, it has to be inside ure client folder.

Read full topic

item.title: HELP Needed Badly!
item.dc:creator: @s0uljag0d s0uljag0d
item.description:
@s0uljag0d wrote:

I Have Winrar. I also tried downloading from mediafire also too see what there seeing and yes, It was a Notepad Document with the “run.bat” editing Code. Can u help me on TV? or Gimme More Information on a better uploading site thats free. And Step by Step Help.
If You Cannot Help Me can u give me a Link To a source With Event Server Manager (Server Control Panel) Or Source And Client That Has That Please? Those are very Helpfull and i love them!

Read full topic

item.title: HELP Needed Badly!
item.dc:creator: @Mr_Bobby Mr. Bobby
item.description:
@Mr_Bobby wrote:

do you have winrar? if you do right click ure client and click send to compressed zip folder, now as for the person who said it was a txt document they most likely didnt have winrar, media fire doesnt convert folders into zip folders they just upload ure files to the net.

winrar download(its 100% free)

http://download.cnet.com/WinRAR-32-bit/3000-2250_4-10007677.html

Read full topic

item.title: HELP Needed Badly!
item.dc:creator: @s0uljag0d s0uljag0d
item.description:
@s0uljag0d wrote:

Hey Guys i got a problem. Im not sure how i release my server. Once i tryed releasing it Someone said it turned out to be in notepad when i released and let people download on mediafire. Now I turned it into Zip file and Uploaded to mediafire and got this. !

C:\Documents and Settings[s]Name Of User[/s]\Local Settings\Temp\ModernScape Client.zip: The archive is either in unknown format or damaged

What Do i Do Moparscape? Please Help. How do i release it for people do download client on Mediafire? Im new to the server releasing thing.
